name: Golf Perfect Shot Experts
description:
Golf perfect shot experts is equipped with responsive controls to give you a perfect golf shot and ultimate golfing sports game experience. Be the real golf pro star and play ball to the hole. Feel the real excitement while playing golf world tour 3d game. Easy to play but hard to master golf real game. Show your best skills to become the mast of royal game by scoring impossible hole. You can play hole in different courses with real rules in golf master real sports game.

In this Golf Tournament, enjoy the top free golf game with lots of challenging levels. A must have play game with addictive levels and interesting gameplay. Score a hole in single shot to get more cash, use cash to buy more sticks and kits in this game. Join the extreme tournament of talents and win the real golf championship to top the leaderboard. You can hit with three types of golf sticks: long distance, medium distance and short distance sticks to make a perfect hole in real king golf tournament game. You will enjoy the most authentic gameplay in golf perfect shot experts game.

Features of Golf Perfect Shot Experts:
• Different game environments: Golf Ground, Green Meadows, city Parks and Island
• Complete real looking 3D golf course ground
• Characters to Choose: Male and Female
• Different Weather Conditions: Rainy, Cloudy and sunny
• 3 type of sticks or putters: Long range, Medium Range, Short Range
• Hurdles or obstacles to increase Difficulty
• Wind Effect or Resistance for Expert Players
• Realistic 3D shots and realistic power controls
• High score board for each mode
• Stunning comic inspired game presentation
• User friendly navigation
• Excellent Sounds
